Module eu.ggam.container.Api
Package eu.ggam.container.api

Interface Server


  • public interface Server
    The interface that must be implemented by complaint servers
    Author:
    Guillermo González de Agüero

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  Server.State
      Possible states for the server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Server.State getState​()
      Gets the current state of the server.
      void start​()
      Initializes the server, changing its state from the default Server.State.STOPPED to Server.State.STARTING.
      void stop​()
      Causes the server to stop.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start​()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes the server, changing its state from the default Server.State.STOPPED to Server.State.STARTING. After all registered lifecycle listeners are called, state will change to Server.State.RUNNING.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • stop

        void stop​()
        Causes the server to stop. State changes to Server.State.STOPPING before calling registered lifecycle listeners. State is then changed to Server.State.STOPPED.

      • getState

        Server.State getState​()
        Gets the current state of the server. Default state upon creation must be Server.State.STOPPED
        Returns:
        current state of the server
